description.value: Padded armor usually consists of thick quilted layers and cloth. This is the cheapest form of armor, and is usually worn by infantry in large armies or by adventurers at the beginning of their career. It may also be worn as a fashion choice for those wishing to look like a warrior while off the battlefield.

unidentified.description: This armor is unusually strong and well-crafted. It is most likely magic, though you can't identify the specific enchantment.
unidentified.name: Unidentified Padded Armor
